name: munew-headless-agent
description: Headless agent is good for crawl data from SPA

MUNEW_BASE_URL.description: Your Munew Application's base url. Example: https://munew.herokuapp.com

GLOBAL_ID.description: Global ID of the headless agent you want to connect. Example: YWdlbnQ6OjE1OTMwNjYzODY5MDU6OmU3MjAwZmU5LWViZTktNDc3Zi1hMDY1LTEzYjFiOTQ3YTAyMQ==

AGENT_SERIAL_ID.description: An UUID to idenity this agent, better you keep same value for this agent. Example: b7f6a100-9a35-4df3-bef9-2c1f6d8c866e

LOG_LEVEL.description: Winston logging level. Default is `info`, find detail from https://github.com/winstonjs/winston#logging-levels
